short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modifies ZenDesk to be more useful

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your ZenDesk experience with Haupt - ZenDesk Improver! This extension optimizes the ZenDesk platform, making it more efficient and user-friendly. Easily modify, organize, and streamline your workflows within ZenDesk to boost productivity. This extension focuses on enhancing ZenDesk's usability, allowing you to navigate and manage tasks more effectively. Simplify your workflow and optimize your ZenDesk experience with this powerful improvement tool.
